name: Depth Siege Atlantis
description: Atlantis needs your help! Pirates have discovered the treasures below and have begun their siege for loot. Defend Atlantis from the pirates depth charges and save it from oblivion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
